dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse report]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 15, 2005 2:26 PM
To: peter@21sextury.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse report]


Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Abuse report
Date: Wed, 15 Jun 2005 14:57:52 +0200
From: Peter Hamilton - 21sextury.com <peter@21sextury.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Dear Sir or Madam,

It has been brought to our attention that our content is being published on
your site without any license. The infringing materials can be found at the
following location(s):
http://www.xxxshed.com/forums/showthread.php?t=112
http://www.xxxshed.com/forums/showthread.php?p=193
_________________________________________

Please find attached the official DMCA Notification of Infringement as
required by law.

We would appreciate if you could promptly remove the material(s) in question
and would confirm the same in writing. Moreover if it is possible, please
send us the IP, from the images were uploaded, and please ban the IP too.

Thank you for your co-operation!

Sincerely,

Peter Csiki
peter@21sextury.com

--
21Sextury.com Productions
Copyright Protection Dept.
http://www.21Sextury.com
Office:+36 1 439 1435
Fax:+36 1 439 1282

------------------------------------------------------------
DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person or
entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or
privileged material. Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use
of, or taking of any action in reliance upon, this information by persons or
entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited. If you received
this in error, please contact the sender and delete the material from any
computer.


----------------------------------------------------------------


--
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
